page.title: 16Village Activities (Page 2)
page.content: {TWYNING PLAYERS:}Drama Group; 2 plays annually. Always short of males. {WOMENS' INSTITUTE:}1/month.Av.age, 60. Committee keen, membership lethargic! {TWYNING TWINKLERS:}"It's so good that people can't wait to get old!" c.50{pensioners}meet in the Fleet Inn Skittle Alley, once a month. They enjoy a week's holiday in May. {WHIST DRIVES & BINGO:}alternate weekly 50p. per ticket or Bingo book. Minimum Bingo prize must be 1/2 of takings. c.18 Whist tables: c.25 Bingo addicts. {PUBLIC HOUSES:}The Village Inn and the Fleet Inn. Both have a Skittle Alley and serve meals. Darts, dominoes and cards are played. Busiest times; summer, Christmas and weekends. {MENU:}Vol-au-vent or T-bone steaks, Steak and kidney pie cooked in Guiness Lasagne, Cottage pie, pizza, Chicken in Barbecue Sauce etc. Av.cost:Â£3.95.
